snippet.title: Super Fancy Livestream #34 - Game Dev Live!  Concepts for the next FPA
snippet.description:
We're back on the anniversary of SFPA's Steam release to discuss game development once again!  I want to give you guys a better idea of what goes into the concept phase for a Fancy Pants game, and hear what you want to see in the next game!

Does anyone even read these??

SFPA on Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/668210/Super_Fancy_Pants_Adventure/
SFPA on iOS - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/super-fancy-pants-adventure/id1289903889
Android coming soon!

Come and give me feedback on these silly live events!

http://BorneGames.com
https://discord.gg/aCHC493
https://twitter.com/DrNeroCF
https://twitter.com/RunFastRunFancy
https://www.facebook.com/thefancypantsadventures/
https://www.instagram.com/fancypantsadventures/
